text: Even though there had been a second gathering of virgins,2:19. Various interpretations have been given to this phrase. However, 2:3 records the decree to “gather virgins” and this could be a second phase of this process. Note also that there is no definite article before virgins in this verse, so likely it would not refer to the existing group. and Mordecai had been given a position by the king,2:19. “Given a position by the king”: literally, “sitting at the king's gate.” Also in verse 21 and subsequently.
